attributes.action: Those in receipt of unemployment or housing benifits should not be alloud to travel abroad on holiday
attributes.additional_details:
Why do we allow those in receipt of unemployment or housing benefits to travel abroad on holiday.

If people in receipt of these benefits can afford this luxury then surely they are not in need of taxpayer assistance.

The government needs to stop this and anyone caught going abroad should have benefits cancelled and not be allowed to reapply for minimum 3 months

This is currently the case in Australia.
